ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Equipment Rehash...
ygData.msgSnippet: my equipment: http://www.afterlifeguild.org/members.cgi?page=details&character=Shada i dunno about you, but sometimes i have 20000 pp in the bank, sometimes i
ygData.messageBody:
my equipment:
http://www.afterlifeguild.org/members.cgi?page=details&character=Shada


i dunno about you, but sometimes i have 20000 pp in the bank, sometimes i
have 200pp. so these upgrades will depend on how much cash you got and what
you can camp alone or grouped.

weapons upgrades:
harmonic dagger: 10/21 55dd/stun proc (warlord/KC)
symphonic saber: 11/23 evade proc (random/chardok)
melodius truncheon: 11/23 mem blur proc (dunno/HS)
breath of harmony: 10/18 niv's melody (blood of chottal/seb)

armor upgrades:

hooded black cloak: ac/str/hp (mistmoore)
electrum black sapphire earrings: ac2 35hp 25mana (jeweler)
velium fire opal rings: ac6 65hp (if yours are platinum)
ry'gorr chain collar: ac9 4sta 4mr (EW elite orcs)
ice forged shackles: awesome bracer and easy quest, can do it solo, check
allakhzam's under icelcad ocean quests)
legs: i dunno if ry'gorr is better than kylong, will look better though.
helm: same as legs, or crown of king tranix.

good luck.

Shada

> -sionoche's partisan
> -journeymans stick
> -mistmoore drums (working on getting selos)
> -lute from mistmoore
> -dragonborne sash
> -lizzie cloak
> -those earrings from mistmoore
> -fire opal rings
> -fungi tunic
> -kylong legs, bracers, hat
> -ss boots, gloves
> -tattered mantle
> -forget the necklace
>
> Let me know which items you all think I can improve on .. especially
> weaponwise...if you want send me a private email so Im not
> spamming everyone
> - this is already long!
>
> Thanks, smooches, love you all :)
>
> Halana, 58th Shammykins
> Tani, 41st Bardette
> Solusek Ro
